message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $11,500. I believe it will be a valuable asset to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,500 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $10,750. This offer reflects the product's worth and allows for a fair deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $10,200? I'm really interested in the product and don't want to walk away, but I need to stay within my means.
